childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation aired its revamped radio station on 17 February. QF Radio is now broadcasting a range of English and Arabic shows through two dedicated channels.

Qatar Foundation has also recently unveiled a state-of-the-art media centre. Its sophisticated studios offer online portals and phone applications for listeners to view live video streaming of their favorite programs and talk shows.

” We are striving to provide our listeners with a platform to discuss the things that matter to them and impact their daily lives,” said Mr Saad Saleh Al-Hudaifi, Media Center Manager at Qatar Foundation. “Our new media centre will accelerate our ability to meet our long-term goals,” Al-Hudaifi explained.

QF Radio will broadcast its programs in Arabic on 93.7 FM and English on 91.7 FM, in addition to the station’s website and phone applications.
